titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide separate subheadings for flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets and to create additional U.S. notes explaining the tariff classification of flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/18/2001--Introduced. Amends the United States Harmonized Tariff Structure to provide separate subheadings for flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets.
